img.title: Events

div.h2: Benton Harbor Charter School Academy is an educational community that teaches each child as an individual.
div.p: We are a tuition-free public school, serving children in grades preschool through eighth grade in the Benton Harbor, MI area. Theclasses are small, so the teacher has the chance to work one-on-one with the students.Discipline is strict, so parents know children learn in a safe environment. Theacademic standards are set high, so children can feel the challenge to reach their highest potential.Character development is a central partof the educational experience to prepare children for active, thoughtful, and caring participation in the world around them.

div.class: fl-post-grid-post fl-post-grid-image-above-title fl-post-align-default post-33067 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news entry

Student video chatting with teacher for distance learning

div.div: Were excited that so many of our parents have picked up their students workbooks. Many students are now actively engaging with their teachers and classmates on their Google Classrooms. We know that distance learning and teaching presents challenges for our

div.a: Continue reading Distance Learning at BHCSA

a.title: In partnership with Whirlpool, students learn about computer science and design thinking

h2.a: In partnership with Whirlpool, students learn about computer science and design thinking

div.div: At Benton Harbor Charter School Academy we are learning about STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Math) through our partnership with the Whirlpool Corporation. Most recently, Whirlpool volunteers brought the goITprogram to our school. All of our middle school students were part

div.a: Continue reading In partnership with Whirlpool, students learn about computer science and design thinking

div.class: fl-post-grid-post fl-post-grid-image-above-title fl-post-align-default post-1573 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-school-news entry

div.div: Today we celebrate our principal, Tim Harris, and our assistant principal, Ashley Smith. We are grateful for their leadership and commitment to making Benton Harbor Charter School Academy a safe, tight-knit community. Mr. Tim Harris is in his nineteenth year

div.a: Continue reading Happy Principal Appreciation Month!

div.p: "BHCS Academy is a wonderful environment, not only for studentsbut for the staff as well. The teachers are great to work with and everyone is so positive-I just love it! I havent been here long, but I can tell the teachers love their jobs, as do the rest of the staff. Everyone has such passion for being here its contagious!"

"Because I am a BHCS Academy team member and parent, I see both sides of this great school. I work with an amazing team of people. We have such a burning desire to see our children grasp everything possible so they can run with it. The hard work and dedication that everyone puts forth is amazing. Not often are you able to find such a large group of people who have such compassion for what they do."

The greatest benefit is seeing the effect on my children. They have developed so much character and personality during the past two years at BHCS Academy. This school has made learning exciting for them and they are proud to say they attend BHCS Academy.

To me, Charter is something more than just a school- its a place where they take learning to another level. At BHCS Academy they treat everyone like family. As a parent, you will always know what is going on with your child, instead of just at conference time. I appreciate that.
What Charter means to my children and me is togetherness, caring, and structure. Most of all, Charter is a wonderful opportunity for learning.

div.script: document.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {jQuery(document).ready(function($){gformInitSpinner( 3, 'https://bentonharborcharter.com/wp-content/plugins/gravityforms/images/spinner.gif' );jQuery('#gform_ajax_frame_3').on('load',function(){var contents = jQuery(this).contents().find('*').html();var is_postback = contents.indexOf('GF_AJAX_POSTBACK') >= 0;if(!is_postback){return;}var form_content = jQuery(this).contents().find('#gform_wrapper_3');var is_confirmation = jQuery(this).contents().find('#gform_confirmation_wrapper_3').length > 0;var is_redirect = contents.indexOf('gformRedirect(){') >= 0;var is_form = form_content.length > 0 && ! is_redirect && ! is_confirmation;var mt = parseInt(jQuery('html').css('margin-top'), 10) + parseInt(jQuery('body').css('margin-top'), 10) + 100;if(is_form){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_3').html(form_content.html());if(form_content.hasClass('gform_validation_error')){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_3').addClass('gform_validation_error');} else {jQuery('#gform_wrapper_3').removeClass('gform_validation_error');}setTimeout( function() { /* delay the scroll by 50 milliseconds to fix a bug in chrome */ jQuery(document).scrollTop(jQuery('#gform_wrapper_3').offset().top - mt); }, 50 );if(window['gformInitDatepicker']) {gformInitDatepicker();}if(window['gformInitPriceFields']) {gformInitPriceFields();}var current_page = jQuery('#gform_source_page_number_3').val();gformInitSpinner( 3, 'https://bentonharborcharter.com/wp-content/plugins/gravityforms/images/spinner.gif' );jQuery(document).trigger('gform_page_loaded', [3, current_page]);window['gf_submitting_3'] = false;}else if(!is_redirect){var confirmation_content = jQuery(this).contents().find('.GF_AJAX_POSTBACK').html();if(!confirmation_content){confirmation_content = contents;}setTimeout(function(){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_3').replaceWith(confirmation_content);jQuery(document).scrollTop(jQuery('#gf_3').offset().top - mt);jQuery(document).trigger('gform_confirmation_loaded', [3]);window['gf_submitting_3'] = false;}, 50);}else{jQuery('#gform_3').append(contents);if(window['gformRedirect']) {gformRedirect();}}jQuery(document).trigger('gform_post_render', [3, current_page]);} );} ); }, false );
